name: Fugitive Shift
description:
LD35

Timelapse

Try my new game, Super Battle Cycle for free!

Fugitive Shift is a short adventure/stealth game about the tale of a few escaping prisoners, some of which have special powers. Control each character throughout the various puzzles and levels.


Controls:
- Mouse: Select, move, or do an action
- Spacebar: Deselect all
- R: Reset
